flavorText: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

foreignData.flavorText: „So viele stellen sich gegen uns, doch wir sind das Schilf, das sich beugt, ohne zu brechen."
foreignData.name: Errettung der Druidin
foreignData.text: Verhindere allen Kampfschaden, der dir in diesem Zug zugefügt würde. Führe Bevölkern durch. (Bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Kreaturenspielsteins ist, den du kontrollierst.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Muchos están en nuestra contra, pero somos el junco que se flexiona sin romperse."
foreignData.name: Liberación del druida
foreignData.text: Prevén todo el daño de combate que se te fuera a hacer este turno. Repuebla. (Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de una ficha de criatura que controlas.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Nombreux sont ceux qui s'opposent à nous, mais nous sommes tels le roseau qui plie sans jamais rompre. »
foreignData.name: Délivrance du druide
foreignData.text: Prévenez toutes les blessures de combat qui devraient vous être infligées ce tour-ci. Peuplez. (Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton de créature que vous contrôlez.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Abbiamo così tanti nemici... ma siamo come la canna che si piega ma non si spezza."
foreignData.name: Liberazione del Druido
foreignData.text: Previeni tutto il danno da combattimento che ti verrebbe inflitto in questo turno. Popola. (Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di una pedina creatura che controlli.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「我々に敵対する者は多い。しかし我々は身を反らし、決して折れることのない葦なのだ。」
foreignData.name: ドルイドの講話
foreignData.text: このターン、あなたに与えられるすべての戦闘ダメージを軽減する。居住を行う。（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体のコピーであるトークンを１体戦場に出す。）

foreignData.flavorText: "많은 이들이 우리를 적대시하지만, 우리는 갈대처럼 구부러질지언정 부러지지는 않는다."
foreignData.name: 드루이드의 구출
foreignData.text: 이 턴에 당신이 입으려고 하는 모든 전투피해를 방지한다. 소집한다. (당신이 조종하는 어느 생물 토큰의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Muitos se opõem a nós, mas somos a relva que se dobra, mas não quebra."
foreignData.name: Salvação do Druida
foreignData.text: Previna todo o dano de combate que seria causado a você neste turno. Povoe. (Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma ficha de criatura que você controla.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Столь многие противостоят нам... Но мы словно тростник — гнемся, но не ломаемся».
foreignData.name: Спасение Друида
foreignData.text: Предотвратите все боевые повреждения, которые должны быть нанесены вам в этом ходу. Используйте Заселение. (Положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией фишки существа под вашим контролем.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「虽面对各种逆境，但我们就像小草，只会弯腰，不会折断。」
foreignData.name: 德鲁伊的解救
foreignData.text:
于本回合中，防止将对你造成的所有战斗伤害。
殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「雖面對各種逆境，但我們就像小草，只會彎腰，不會折斷。」
foreignData.name: 德魯伊的解救
foreignData.text: 於本回合中，防止將對你造成的所有戰鬥傷害。殖民。（將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為由你操控的某衍生生物之複製品。）

name: Druid's Deliverance
originalText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.
You can cast Druid’s Deliverance even if you don’t control any creature tokens.
Combat damage dealt to creatures or planeswalkers you control won’t be prevented.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, combat damage dealt to your teammate won’t be prevented.

text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
